mapper.select: SELECT u.user_nickname, lc.list_comment_content, lc.list_comment_updated_time, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `like` k WHERE k.list_comment_seq = lc.list_comment_seq) AS like_count FROM list_comment lc LEFT JOIN users u ON lc.list_comment_user_seq = u.user_seq LEFT JOIN lists l ON lc.list_seq = l.list_seq WHERE l.list_seq = #{listSeq} AND lc.list_comment_status = 'active' ORDER BY lc.list_comment_updated_time DESC;
